alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern West Baton Rouge, central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oak Hills Place, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Westminster, Inniswold, Village St. George, Gardere, Old Jefferson and Shenandoah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 138 and 169. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 6. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
